Sentencas: Sluggish oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) kinetics and chemical instability of cathode materials hinder the practical application of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Highly Active and Stable Cobalt-Free Hafnium-doped SrFe0.9Hf0.1O3-δ Perovskite Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Here we report a Co-free Hf-doped SrFe0.9Hf0.1O3-delta (SFHf) perovskite oxide as a potential cathode focusing on enhancing the ORR activity and chemical stability.
Titulo: Highly Active and Stable Cobalt-Free Hafnium-doped SrFe0.9Hf0.1O3-δ Perovskite Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We find that SFHf exhibits a high ORR activity, stable cubic crystal structure, and improved chemical stability toward CO2 poisoning compared to undoped SrFeO3-delta.
Titulo: Highly Active and Stable Cobalt-Free Hafnium-doped SrFe0.9Hf0.1O3-δ Perovskite Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The SFHf cathode has a polarization area-specific resistance as low as 0.193 Omega cm(2) at 600 degrees C in a SFHflSm(0.2)Ce(0.8)O(1.9)
Titulo: Highly Active and Stable Cobalt-Free Hafnium-doped SrFe0.9Hf0.1O3-δ Perovskite Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: (SDC)ISFHf symmetrical cell and has a maximum power density as high as 1.94 W cm(-2) at 700 degrees C in an anode-supported fuel cell (Ni+(ZrO2)(0.92)(Y2O3)(0.08) (YSZ)vertical bar YSZ vertical bar SDC vertical bar SFHf).
Titulo: Highly Active and Stable Cobalt-Free Hafnium-doped SrFe0.9Hf0.1O3-δ Perovskite Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The ORR activity maintains stable for a period air and in CO2-containing atmosphere.
Titulo: Highly Active and Stable Cobalt-Free Hafnium-doped SrFe0.9Hf0.1O3-δ Perovskite Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The attractive ORR activity is attributed to the moderate concentration of oxygen vacancy and electrical conductivity, as well as the fast oxygen kinetics at the operation temperature.
Titulo: Highly Active and Stable Cobalt-Free Hafnium-doped SrFe0.9Hf0.1O3-δ Perovskite Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The improved chemical stability is related to the doping of the redox-inactive Hf cation in the Fe site of SrFeO3-delta by decreasing oxygen vacancy concentration and increasing metal oxygen bond energy.
Titulo: Highly Active and Stable Cobalt-Free Hafnium-doped SrFe0.9Hf0.1O3-δ Perovskite Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This work proposes an effective strategy in the design of highly active and stable cathodes for SOFCs.
Titulo: Highly Active and Stable Cobalt-Free Hafnium-doped SrFe0.9Hf0.1O3-δ Perovskite Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
